knimeNode.name: Centraliser
knimeNode.shortDescription: Centres a blob of white pixels to the centre of the image. Given the centroid of a white blob of pixels, moves the blob to match the center of the actual image.

fullDescription.intro: Centres a blob of white pixels to the centre of the image. Given the centroid of a white blob of pixels, moves the blob to match the center of the actual image.
fullDescription.option: In case of multiple image columns, specify the column name
Name of the column with includes the x of the centroid
Name of the column with includes the y of the centroid
